title: S3 LF Solo Partner mid Silver
body: Hey guys, ive finished my promos on my smurf and got silver 4, won 9-10 so looking for someone that actually wants to try and climb and not give up, Cheers ! Add me and must have voice coms, discord or skype or ts :) Im a ADC main but play mid, top and support more than fine and have  been playing since season one !
